$:/plugins/jd/mob/readme.creator: JD
$:/plugins/jd/mob/readme.text: This is a mobile layout that applies to narrow screens. It introduces the following: # A Topbar that can be any of the following: #* Hidden #* Titlebar (search, title, subtitle, menu) #* Mobbuttons bar #** Buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobbutton'' #* Searchbar #** Simple searchbar lists standard search results only #** Combined searchbar lists all search results (possibly slow on some devices) #* Control area containing ''Top Left Bar'', ''Page Control'', ''Mob-only'', and ''Top Right Bar'' buttons (in that order) #** ''Top Left Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopLeftBar'' #** ''Page control'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/PageControls'' #** ''Mob-only'' >> other buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobbutton'' #** ''Top Right Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopRightBar'' #** Buttons you don't want to appear here should be tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobno'' # A Bottombar that can be any of the following: #* Hidden #* Mobbuttons bar #** Buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobbutton'' #* Control area containing ''Top Left Bar'', ''Page Control'', ''Mob-only'', and ''Top Right Bar'' buttons (in that order) #** ''Top Left Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopLeftBar'' #** ''Page control'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/PageControls'' #** ''Mob-only'' >> other buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobbutton'' #** ''Top Right Bar'' >> buttons tagged ''~$:/tags/TopRightBar'' #** Buttons you don't want to appear here should be tagged ''~$:/tags/jd/mobno'' //Note:// This layout is tied to the ''Sidebar Breakpoint'' set at ''Control Panel'' >> ''Appearance'' >> ''Theme Tweaks''. This layout is compatible with any core theme as of release date. Project Homepage on Tiddlyspot !! Version History !!! 2018-09-03 Release of version 1.0.4 * Added ability to create tiddler out of search term via "+" button, or keyboard shortcut: "ctrl+space" [[Detailed changelog|http://j.d.simplemobile.tiddlyspot.com/#Changelog]]
$:/plugins/jd/mob/readme.title: $:/plugins/jd/mob/readme
